newsitem.title: JAPAN: Mexico raises April Maya price to Asia--traders.
newsitem.headline: Mexico raises April Maya price to Asia--traders.

text.p: Mexico has raised the price formula for its April-lifting Maya crude oil to Asia by 10 cents per barrel, but rolled over the price of Isthmus crude oil, traders said on Friday.
The price formula for Maya loaded in April was raised by 10 cents to the average of Oman and Dubai quotations minus $3.20 a barrel from minus $3.30 for March loading.
April-lifting Isthmus was unchanged from the previous month's price of the average of Oman and Dubai quotations plus 60 cents, they said.
